TestCase.name: testAggregateWithAuxGroup_JoinKeyIsNotUnique1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a2, b2, c2, SUM(a) FROM (SELECT * FROM T2, T WHERE a2 = a) GROUP BY a2, b2, c2

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], EXPR$3=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c2, a]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c2, a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $3)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c2, EXPR$3]) +- LogicalProject(select=[b2, a2, c2, EXPR$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$3=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

TestCase.name: testAggregateWithAuxGroup_JoinKeyIsNotUnique2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a2, b2, c, SUM(a) FROM (SELECT * FROM T2, T WHERE a2 = a) GROUP BY a2, b2, c

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], EXPR$3=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c, a]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c2, a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $3)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c, EXPR$3]) +- LogicalProject(select=[b2, c, a2, EXPR$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 2}], EXPR$3=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

TestCase.name: testAggregateWithAuxGroup_JoinKeyIsUnique1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a2, b2, c2, SUM(a) FROM (SELECT * FROM T2, T WHERE b2 = b) GROUP BY a2, b2, c2

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], EXPR$3=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c2, a]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c2, a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($1, $4)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c2, EXPR$3]) +- LogicalProject(select=[b2, a2, c2, EXPR$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], EXPR$3=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

TestCase.name: testAggregateWithAuxGroup_JoinKeyIsUnique2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a2, b2, c, SUM(a) FROM (SELECT * FROM T2, T WHERE b2 = b) GROUP BY a2, b2, c

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], EXPR$3=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c, a]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c2, a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($1, $4)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c, EXPR$3]) +- LogicalProject(select=[b2, c, a2, EXPR$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1, 2}], EXPR$3=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

TestCase.name: testPushAggThroughJoinWithUniqueJoinKey
TestCase.Resource: WITH T1 AS (SELECT a AS a1, COUNT(b) AS b1 FROM T GROUP BY a), T2 AS (SELECT COUNT(a) AS a2, b AS b2 FROM T GROUP BY b) SELECT MIN(a1), MIN(b1), MIN(a2), MIN(b2), a, b, COUNT(c) FROM (SELECT * FROM T1, T2, T WHERE a1 = b2 AND a1 = a) t GROUP BY a, b

LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, EXPR$2, EXPR$3, a, b, EXPR$6]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$0=[MIN($2)], EXPR$1=[MIN($3)], EXPR$2=[MIN($4)], EXPR$3=[MIN($5)], EXPR$6=[COUNT($6)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, a1, b1, a2, b2, c]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1, a2, b2, a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($0, $4))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b1=[COUNT($1)]) : : +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[COUNT($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[b2, a]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, EXPR$2, EXPR$3, a, b, EXPR$6]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, a0, b1, a2, b2, EXPR$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b1=[COUNT($1)]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], a2=[COUNT($0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$6=[COUNT($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

TestCase.name: testPushCountAggThroughJoinOverUniqueColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(A.a) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT a FROM T) AS A JOIN T AS B ON A.a=B.a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[$SUM0($0)]) +- LogicalProject($f4=[*($1, $3)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a]), 1:BIGINT, 0:BIGINT)]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

TestCase.name: testPushSumAggThroughJoinOverUniqueColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT SUM(A.a) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT a FROM T) AS A JOIN T AS B ON A.a=B.a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject($f3=[CAST(*($0, $2)):INTEGER]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

TestCase.name: testSomeAggCallColumnsAndJoinConditionColumnsIsSame
TestCase.Resource: SELECT MIN(a2), MIN(b2), a, b, COUNT(c2) FROM (SELECT * FROM T2, T WHERE b2 = a) t GROUP BY a, b

LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, a, b, EXPR$4]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$0=[MIN($2)], EXPR$1=[MIN($3)], EXPR$4=[COUNT($4)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, a2, b2, c2]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c2, a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($1, $3)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, a, b, EXPR$4]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, a2, b2])]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[b2, a2]), 1:BIGINT, 0:BIGINT)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], agg#0=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])
